name: Superiority Complex
desc: Grants +1 ATK per stat unit has higher than foe.
components: (max(0,min(1,unit.get_stat('STR') - target.get_stat('STR'))) + max(0,min(1,unit.get_stat('MAG') - target.get_stat('MAG'))) +max(0,min(1,unit.get_stat('SKL') - target.get_stat('SKL'))) +max(0,min(1,unit.get_stat('SPD') - target.get_stat('SPD'))) +max(0,min(1,unit.get_stat('LCK') - target.get_stat('LCK'))) +max(0,min(1,unit.get_stat('DEF') - target.get_stat('DEF'))) +max(0,min(1,unit.get_stat('RES') - target.get_stat('RES'))))
